titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on thiophanate-methyl fungicide 70% wettable powder.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on thiophanate-methyl fungicide 70% wettable powder.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on thiophanate-methyl fungicide 70% wettable powder.
